New Records: Taskin Ahmed recorded his best T20I performance with four wickets for 25 runs
Key Match Events: The Netherlands lost two quick wickets in the first two balls
Max ODowd and Tom Cooper were run out in quick succession
Colin Ackermann and Scott Edwards' 44-run stand
Mustafizur Rahman conceded only eight runs in the last over
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh won the toss and chose to bat first
The Netherlands opted to bowl first
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh secured their first Super 12 win
The team expressed confidence for their next match against South Africa
